00069   class MESQUITE_EXPORT Matrix3D 
00070   {
00071   protected:
00072     double v_[9];                  
00073 
00074    
00075     void copy(const double*  v)
00076     { 
00077       v_[0] = v[0];
00078       v_[1] = v[1];
00079       v_[2] = v[2];
00080       v_[3] = v[3];
00081       v_[4] = v[4];
00082       v_[5] = v[5];
00083       v_[6] = v[6];
00084       v_[7] = v[7];
00085       v_[8] = v[8];
00086     }
00087 
00088     void set(double val)
00089     {
00090       v_[0]=val;  v_[1]=val;  v_[2]=val;
00091       v_[3]=val;  v_[4]=val;  v_[5]=val;
00092       v_[6]=val;  v_[7]=val;  v_[8]=val;
00093     }
00094 
00095     inline void set_values(const char *s);
00096     
00097   public:
00098 
00099     // constructors
00101     Matrix3D()
00102     {
00103       zero();
00104     }
00105     
00106     Matrix3D(const Matrix3D &A)
00107     {
00108       copy(A.v_);
00109     }
00110 
00112     Matrix3D(double value)
00113     {
00114       set(value);
00115     }
00116     
00117     Matrix3D( double a00, double a01, double a02,
00118               double a10, double a11, double a12,
00119               double a20, double a21, double a22 )
00120     {
00121       v_[0] = a00; v_[1] = a01; v_[2] = a02;
00122       v_[3] = a10; v_[4] = a11; v_[5] = a12;
00123       v_[6] = a20; v_[7] = a21; v_[8] = a22;
00124     }
00125     
00126     Matrix3D( const Vector3D& col1,
00127               const Vector3D& col2,
00128               const Vector3D& col3 )
00129     {
00130       set_column( 0, col1 );
00131       set_column( 1, col2 );
00132       set_column( 2, col3 );
00133     }
00134     
00135     Matrix3D( double radians, const Vector3D& axis )
00136     {
00137       Vector3D v(axis);
00138       v.normalize();
00139       const double c = std::cos( radians );
00140       const double s = std::sin( radians );
00141       v_[0] =  c      + (1.0 - c) * v[0]*v[0];
00142       v_[1] = -v[2]*s + (1.0 - c) * v[0]*v[1];
00143       v_[2] =  v[1]*s + (1.0 - c) * v[0]*v[2];
00144       v_[3] =  v[2]*s + (1.0 - c) * v[0]*v[1];
00145       v_[4] =  c      + (1.0 - c) * v[1]*v[1];
00146       v_[5] = -v[0]*s + (1.0 - c) * v[1]*v[2];
00147       v_[6] = -v[1]*s + (1.0 - c) * v[0]*v[2];
00148       v_[7] =  v[0]*s + (1.0 - c) * v[1]*v[2];
00149       v_[8] =  c      + (1.0 - c) * v[2]*v[2];
00150     }
00151       
00152 
00155     Matrix3D(const double* v)
00156     {
00157       copy(v);
00158     }
00159 
00162     Matrix3D(const char *s)
00163     {
00164       set_values(s);
00165     }
00166     
00167     Matrix3D( const SymMatrix3D& m )
00168     {
00169       *this = m;
00170     }
00171 
00172     // destructor
00173     ~Matrix3D() { }
00174 
00175     // assignments
00176     Matrix3D& operator=(const Matrix3D &A)
00177     {
00178       copy(A.v_);
00179       return *this;
00180     }
00181     
00182     Matrix3D& operator=( const SymMatrix3D& m )
00183     {
00184       v_[0]         = m[0];
00185       v_[1] = v_[3] = m[1];
00186       v_[2] = v_[6] = m[2];
00187       v_[4]         = m[3];
00188       v_[5] = v_[7] = m[4];
00189       v_[8]         = m[5];
00190       return *this;
00191     }
00192     
00193         
00194     Matrix3D& operator=(double scalar)
00195     { 
00196       set(scalar); 
00197       return *this;
00198     }
00199 
00202     Matrix3D& operator=(const char* s)
00203     { 
00204       set_values(s); 
00205       return *this;
00206     }
00207 
00209     void zero()
00210     {
00211       v_[0]=0.;  v_[1]=0.;  v_[2]=0.;
00212       v_[3]=0.;  v_[4]=0.;  v_[5]=0.;
00213       v_[6]=0.;  v_[7]=0.;  v_[8]=0.;
00214     }
00215     
00216     void identity()
00217     {
00218       v_[0]=1.;  v_[1]=0.;  v_[2]=0.;
00219       v_[3]=0.;  v_[4]=1.;  v_[5]=0.;
00220       v_[6]=0.;  v_[7]=0.;  v_[8]=1.;
00221     }
00222       
00223      
00225     void set_column(int j, const Vector3D& c)
00226     {
00227       v_[0+j]=c[0];
00228       v_[3+j]=c[1];
00229       v_[6+j]=c[2];
00230     }
00231     
00233     double column_length(int i) const 
00234     { return sqrt( v_[0+i]*v_[0+i] + v_[3+i]*v_[3+i] + v_[6+i]*v_[6+i] ); }
00235 
00236 
00237     double sub_det( int r, int c ) const
00238     {
00239       int r1 = 3 * ((r + 1) % 3);
00240       int r2 = 3 * ((r + 2) % 3);
00241       int c1 =     ((c + 1) % 3);
00242       int c2 =     ((c + 2) % 3);
00243       return v_[r1+c1] * v_[r2+c2] - v_[r2+c1] * v_[r1+c2];
00244     }

00296 
00297     size_t num_rows() const { return 3; }
00298     size_t num_cols() const { return 3; }
00299 
00301     inline double* operator[](unsigned i)
00302     {
00303       return v_ + 3*i;
00304     }
00305 
00307     inline const double* operator[](unsigned i) const
00308     {
00309       return v_ + 3*i;
00310     }
00311     
00312     inline double& operator()(unsigned short r, unsigned short c)
00313     {
00314       return v_[3*r+c];
00315     }
00316     inline double operator()(unsigned short r, unsigned short c) const
00317     {
00318       return v_[3*r+c];
00319     }
00320     
00321     
00322     
00323     inline Vector3D row(unsigned r) const
00324     {
00325       return Vector3D( v_ + 3*r );
00326     }
00327     
00328     inline Vector3D column( unsigned c ) const
00329     {
00330       return Vector3D( v_[c], v_[c+3], v_[c+6] );
00331     }
00332 
00333     inline bool positive_definite() const;
00334     
00335     inline SymMatrix3D upper() const
00336     {
00337       return SymMatrix3D( v_[0], v_[1], v_[2],
00338                                  v_[4], v_[5],
00339                                         v_[8] );
00340     }
00341     inline SymMatrix3D lower() const
00342     {
00343       return SymMatrix3D( v_[0], v_[3], v_[6],
00344                                  v_[4], v_[7],
00345                                         v_[8] );
00346     }
00347   };

00352   inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, const Matrix3D &A)
00353   {
00354     for (size_t i=0; i<3; ++i)
00355       {
00356         for (size_t j=0; j<3; ++j)
00357           s << A[i][j] << " ";
00358         s << "\n";
00359       }
00360     return s;
00361   }
00362 
00363   inline std::istream& operator>>(std::istream &s, Matrix3D &A)
00364   {
00365     for (size_t i=0; i<3; i++)
00366       for (size_t j=0; j<3; j++)
00367         {
00368           s >>  A[i][j];
00369         }
00370     return s;
00371   }
00372 
00373   void Matrix3D::set_values(const char *s)
00374   {
00375     std::istringstream ins(s);
00376     ins >> *this;
00377   }

00379   // *********** matrix operators *******************
00380 
00381   // comparison functions
00382   inline bool operator==(const Matrix3D &lhs, const Matrix3D &rhs)
00383   {
00384     return lhs.v_[0] == rhs.v_[0]
00385         && lhs.v_[1] == rhs.v_[1]
00386         && lhs.v_[2] == rhs.v_[2]
00387         && lhs.v_[3] == rhs.v_[3]
00388         && lhs.v_[4] == rhs.v_[4]
00389         && lhs.v_[5] == rhs.v_[5]
00390         && lhs.v_[6] == rhs.v_[6]
00391         && lhs.v_[7] == rhs.v_[7]
00392         && lhs.v_[8] == rhs.v_[8];
00393   }
00394   inline bool operator!=(const Matrix3D &lhs, const Matrix3D &rhs)
00395   { return !(lhs == rhs); }
00396 
00397   inline Matrix3D operator-( const Matrix3D& A )
00398   {
00399     return Matrix3D( -A.v_[0],
00400                      -A.v_[1],
00401                      -A.v_[2],
00402                      -A.v_[3],
00403                      -A.v_[4],
00404                      -A.v_[5],
00405                      -A.v_[6],
00406                      -A.v_[7],
00407                      -A.v_[8] );
00408   }
00409                      
00411   inline const Matrix3D operator+(const Matrix3D &A, 
00412                             const Matrix3D &B)
00413   {
00414     Matrix3D tmp(A);
00415     tmp += B;
00416     return tmp;
00417   }
00418   
00419   inline Matrix3D operator+( const Matrix3D& A, const SymMatrix3D& B )
00420   {
00421     return Matrix3D( A(0,0) + B[SymMatrix3D::T00],
00422                      A(0,1) + B[SymMatrix3D::T01],
00423                      A(0,2) + B[SymMatrix3D::T02],
00424                      A(1,0) + B[SymMatrix3D::T10],
00425                      A(1,1) + B[SymMatrix3D::T11],
00426                      A(1,2) + B[SymMatrix3D::T12],
00427                      A(2,0) + B[SymMatrix3D::T20],
00428                      A(2,1) + B[SymMatrix3D::T21],
00429                      A(2,2) + B[SymMatrix3D::T22] );
00430   }
00431   inline Matrix3D operator+( const SymMatrix3D& B, const Matrix3D& A )
00432     { return A + B; }
00433 
00435   inline const Matrix3D operator-(const Matrix3D &A, 
00436                             const Matrix3D &B)
00437   {
00438     Matrix3D tmp(A);
00439     tmp -= B;
00440     return tmp;
00441   }
00442   
00443   inline Matrix3D operator-( const Matrix3D& A, const SymMatrix3D& B )
00444   {
00445     return Matrix3D( A(0,0) - B[SymMatrix3D::T00],
00446                      A(0,1) - B[SymMatrix3D::T01],
00447                      A(0,2) - B[SymMatrix3D::T02],
00448                      A(1,0) - B[SymMatrix3D::T10],
00449                      A(1,1) - B[SymMatrix3D::T11],
00450                      A(1,2) - B[SymMatrix3D::T12],
00451                      A(2,0) - B[SymMatrix3D::T20],
00452                      A(2,1) - B[SymMatrix3D::T21],
00453                      A(2,2) - B[SymMatrix3D::T22] );
00454   }
00455   inline Matrix3D operator-( const SymMatrix3D& B, const Matrix3D& A )
00456   {
00457     return Matrix3D( B[SymMatrix3D::T00] - A(0,0),
00458                      B[SymMatrix3D::T01] - A(0,1),
00459                      B[SymMatrix3D::T02] - A(0,2),
00460                      B[SymMatrix3D::T10] - A(1,0),
00461                      B[SymMatrix3D::T11] - A(1,1),
00462                      B[SymMatrix3D::T12] - A(1,2),
00463                      B[SymMatrix3D::T20] - A(2,0),
00464                      B[SymMatrix3D::T21] - A(2,1),
00465                      B[SymMatrix3D::T22] - A(2,2) );
00466   }
00467   
00468   inline Matrix3D& Matrix3D::equal_mult_elem( const Matrix3D& A )
00469   {
00470         v_[0] *= A.v_[0];    
00471         v_[1] *= A.v_[1];    
00472         v_[2] *= A.v_[2];    
00473         v_[3] *= A.v_[3];    
00474         v_[4] *= A.v_[4];    
00475         v_[5] *= A.v_[5];    
00476         v_[6] *= A.v_[6];    
00477         v_[7] *= A.v_[7];    
00478         v_[8] *= A.v_[8];
00479     return *this;
00480   } 
00481 
00483   inline const Matrix3D mult_element(const Matrix3D &A, 
00484                                const Matrix3D &B)
00485   {
00486     Matrix3D tmp(A);
00487     tmp.equal_mult_elem(B);
00488     return tmp;
00489   }
00490 
00492   inline double Frobenius_2(const Matrix3D &A)
00493   {
00494     return A.v_[0] * A.v_[0]
00495          + A.v_[1] * A.v_[1]
00496          + A.v_[2] * A.v_[2]
00497          + A.v_[3] * A.v_[3]
00498          + A.v_[4] * A.v_[4]
00499          + A.v_[5] * A.v_[5]
00500          + A.v_[6] * A.v_[6]
00501          + A.v_[7] * A.v_[7]
00502          + A.v_[8] * A.v_[8];
00503   }
00504   
00505   inline Matrix3D& Matrix3D::transpose()
00506   {
00507     double t;
00508     t = v_[1]; v_[1] = v_[3]; v_[3] = t;
00509     t = v_[2]; v_[2] = v_[6]; v_[6] = t;
00510     t = v_[5]; v_[5] = v_[7]; v_[7] = t;
00511     return *this;
00512   }
00513   
00514   inline Matrix3D transpose(const Matrix3D &A)
00515   {
00516     Matrix3D S;
00517 //     size_t i;
00518 //     for (i=0; i<3; ++i) {
00519 //         S[size_t(0)][i] = A[i][0];
00520 //         S[size_t(1)][i] = A[i][1];
00521 //         S[size_t(2)][i] = A[i][2];
00522 //     }
00523     S.v_[0]=A.v_[0]; S.v_[1]=A.v_[3]; S.v_[2]=A.v_[6];
00524     S.v_[3]=A.v_[1]; S.v_[4]=A.v_[4]; S.v_[5]=A.v_[7];
00525     S.v_[6]=A.v_[2]; S.v_[7]=A.v_[5]; S.v_[8]=A.v_[8];
00526     
00527     return S;
00528   }
00529 
00530   inline void Matrix3D::operator+=(const Matrix3D &rhs)
00531   {
00532       v_[0] += rhs.v_[0]; v_[1] += rhs.v_[1]; v_[2] += rhs.v_[2];
00533       v_[3] += rhs.v_[3]; v_[4] += rhs.v_[4]; v_[5] += rhs.v_[5];
00534       v_[6] += rhs.v_[6]; v_[7] += rhs.v_[7]; v_[8] += rhs.v_[8];
00535   }
00536 
00537   inline void Matrix3D::operator+=(const SymMatrix3D &rhs)
00538   {
00539       v_[0] += rhs[0]; v_[1] += rhs[1]; v_[2] += rhs[2];
00540       v_[3] += rhs[1]; v_[4] += rhs[3]; v_[5] += rhs[4];
00541       v_[6] += rhs[2]; v_[7] += rhs[4]; v_[8] += rhs[5];
00542   }
00543 
00544   inline void Matrix3D::operator-=(const Matrix3D &rhs)
00545   {
00546       v_[0] -= rhs.v_[0]; v_[1] -= rhs.v_[1]; v_[2] -= rhs.v_[2];
00547       v_[3] -= rhs.v_[3]; v_[4] -= rhs.v_[4]; v_[5] -= rhs.v_[5];
00548       v_[6] -= rhs.v_[6]; v_[7] -= rhs.v_[7]; v_[8] -= rhs.v_[8];
00549   }
00550 
00551   inline void Matrix3D::operator-=(const SymMatrix3D &rhs)
00552   {
00553       v_[0] -= rhs[0]; v_[1] -= rhs[1]; v_[2] -= rhs[2];
00554       v_[3] -= rhs[1]; v_[4] -= rhs[3]; v_[5] -= rhs[4];
00555       v_[6] -= rhs[2]; v_[7] -= rhs[4]; v_[8] -= rhs[5];
00556   }
00557 
00559   inline void Matrix3D::operator*=(double s)
00560   {
00561       v_[0] *= s; v_[1] *= s; v_[2] *= s;
00562       v_[3] *= s; v_[4] *= s; v_[5] *= s;
00563       v_[6] *= s; v_[7] *= s; v_[8] *= s;
00564   }
00565   
00567   inline Matrix3D& Matrix3D::plus_transpose_equal( const Matrix3D& b )
00568   {
00569     if (&b == this) {
00570       v_[0] *= 2.0;
00571       v_[1] += v_[3];
00572       v_[2] += v_[6];
00573       v_[3]  = v_[1];
00574       v_[4] *= 2.0;
00575       v_[5] += v_[7];
00576       v_[6]  = v_[2];
00577       v_[7]  = v_[5];
00578       v_[8] *= 2.0;
00579     }
00580     else {
00581       v_[0] += b.v_[0];
00582       v_[1] += b.v_[3];
00583       v_[2] += b.v_[6];
00584 
00585       v_[3] += b.v_[1];
00586       v_[4] += b.v_[4];
00587       v_[5] += b.v_[7];
00588 
00589       v_[6] += b.v_[2];
00590       v_[7] += b.v_[5];
00591       v_[8] += b.v_[8];
00592     }
00593     return *this;
00594   }
00595 
00597   inline Matrix3D plus_transpose(const Matrix3D& A, const Matrix3D &B) 
00598   {
00599     Matrix3D tmp(A);
00600     tmp.plus_transpose_equal( B );
00601     return tmp;
00602   }
00603 
00605   inline Matrix3D& Matrix3D::outer_product(const Vector3D  &v1, const Vector3D &v2)
00606   {
00607     // remember, matrix entries are v_[0] to v_[8].
00608     
00609     // diagonal
00610     v_[0] = v1[0]*v2[0];
00611     v_[4] = v1[1]*v2[1];
00612     v_[8] = v1[2]*v2[2];
00613 
00614     // upper triangular part
00615     v_[1] = v1[0]*v2[1];
00616     v_[2] = v1[0]*v2[2];
00617     v_[5] = v1[1]*v2[2];
00618 
00619     // lower triangular part
00620     v_[3] = v2[0]*v1[1];
00621     v_[6] = v2[0]*v1[2];
00622     v_[7] = v2[1]*v1[2];
00623 
00624     return *this;
00625   }
00626 
00627   inline void Matrix3D::fill_lower_triangle()
00628   {
00629     v_[3] = v_[1];
00630     v_[6] = v_[2];
00631     v_[7] = v_[5];
00632   } 
00633 
00635   inline const Matrix3D operator*(const Matrix3D  &A, 
00636                             const Matrix3D &B)
00637   {
00638     Matrix3D tmp;
00639     tmp.assign_product( A, B );
00640     return tmp;
00641   }
00642   
00643   inline const Matrix3D operator*( const Matrix3D& A, 
00644                                    const SymMatrix3D& B )
00645   {
00646     return Matrix3D( A(0,0)*B[0] + A(0,1)*B[1] + A(0,2)*B[2],
00647                      A(0,0)*B[1] + A(0,1)*B[3] + A(0,2)*B[4],
00648                      A(0,0)*B[2] + A(0,1)*B[4] + A(0,2)*B[5],
00649                      
00650                      A(1,0)*B[0] + A(1,1)*B[1] + A(1,2)*B[2],
00651                      A(1,0)*B[1] + A(1,1)*B[3] + A(1,2)*B[4],
00652                      A(1,0)*B[2] + A(1,1)*B[4] + A(1,2)*B[5],
00653                      
00654                      A(2,0)*B[0] + A(2,1)*B[1] + A(2,2)*B[2],
00655                      A(2,0)*B[1] + A(2,1)*B[3] + A(2,2)*B[4],
00656                      A(2,0)*B[2] + A(2,1)*B[4] + A(2,2)*B[5] );
00657   }
00658   
00659   inline const Matrix3D operator*( const SymMatrix3D& B,
00660                                    const Matrix3D& A )
00661   {
00662     return Matrix3D( A(0,0)*B[0] + A(1,0)*B[1] + A(2,0)*B[2],
00663                      A(0,1)*B[0] + A(1,1)*B[1] + A(2,1)*B[2],
00664                      A(0,2)*B[0] + A(1,2)*B[1] + A(2,2)*B[2],
00665 
00666                      A(0,0)*B[1] + A(1,0)*B[3] + A(2,0)*B[4],
00667                      A(0,1)*B[1] + A(1,1)*B[3] + A(2,1)*B[4],
00668                      A(0,2)*B[1] + A(1,2)*B[3] + A(2,2)*B[4],
00669 
00670                      A(0,0)*B[2] + A(1,0)*B[4] + A(2,0)*B[5],
00671                      A(0,1)*B[2] + A(1,1)*B[4] + A(2,1)*B[5],
00672                      A(0,2)*B[2] + A(1,2)*B[4] + A(2,2)*B[5] );
00673   }
00674   
00675   inline const Matrix3D operator*( const SymMatrix3D& a,
00676                                    const SymMatrix3D& b )
00677   {
00678     return Matrix3D( a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[1] + a[2]*b[2],
00679                      a[0]*b[1] + a[1]*b[3] + a[2]*b[4],
00680                      a[0]*b[2] + a[1]*b[4] + a[2]*b[5],
00681                      
00682                      a[1]*b[0] + a[3]*b[1] + a[4]*b[2],
00683                      a[1]*b[1] + a[3]*b[3] + a[4]*b[4],
00684                      a[1]*b[2] + a[3]*b[4] + a[4]*b[5],
00685                      
00686                      a[2]*b[0] + a[4]*b[1] + a[5]*b[2],
00687                      a[2]*b[1] + a[4]*b[3] + a[5]*b[4],
00688                      a[2]*b[2] + a[4]*b[4] + a[5]*b[5] );
00689   }

00692    
00694   inline const Matrix3D Matrix3D::operator*(double s) const
00695   {
00696     Matrix3D temp(*this);
00697     temp *= s;
00698     return temp;
00699   }
00702    inline const Matrix3D operator*(double s, const Matrix3D &A)
00703    {
00704      return (A.operator*(s));
00705    }
00706    
00707 
00708   inline Matrix3D& Matrix3D::assign_product( const Matrix3D& A, const Matrix3D& B)
00709   {
00710     v_[0] = A.v_[0]*B.v_[0] + A.v_[1]*B.v_[3] + A.v_[2]*B.v_[6];
00711     v_[1] = A.v_[0]*B.v_[1] + A.v_[1]*B.v_[4] + A.v_[2]*B.v_[7];
00712     v_[2] = A.v_[0]*B.v_[2] + A.v_[1]*B.v_[5] + A.v_[2]*B.v_[8];
00713     v_[3] = A.v_[3]*B.v_[0] + A.v_[4]*B.v_[3] + A.v_[5]*B.v_[6];
00714     v_[4] = A.v_[3]*B.v_[1] + A.v_[4]*B.v_[4] + A.v_[5]*B.v_[7];
00715     v_[5] = A.v_[3]*B.v_[2] + A.v_[4]*B.v_[5] + A.v_[5]*B.v_[8];
00716     v_[6] = A.v_[6]*B.v_[0] + A.v_[7]*B.v_[3] + A.v_[8]*B.v_[6];
00717     v_[7] = A.v_[6]*B.v_[1] + A.v_[7]*B.v_[4] + A.v_[8]*B.v_[7];
00718     v_[8] = A.v_[6]*B.v_[2] + A.v_[7]*B.v_[5] + A.v_[8]*B.v_[8];
00719     return *this;
00720   }
00721    
00722 
00724   inline void matmult(Matrix3D& C, const Matrix3D  &A, const Matrix3D &B)
00725   {
00726     C.assign_product( A, B );
00727   }
00728 
00730   inline const Vector3D operator*(const Matrix3D  &A, const Vector3D &x)
00731   {
00732     Vector3D tmp;
00733     eqAx( tmp, A, x );
00734     return tmp;
00735   }
00736 
00742   inline const Vector3D operator*(const Vector3D &x, const Matrix3D  &A)
00743   {
00744     Vector3D tmp;
00745     eqTransAx( tmp, A, x );
00746     return tmp;
00747   }
00748    
00749   inline void eqAx(Vector3D& v, const Matrix3D& A, const Vector3D& x)
00750   {
00751      v.mCoords[0] = A.v_[0]*x[0] + A.v_[1]*x.mCoords[1] + A.v_[2]*x.mCoords[2];
00752      v.mCoords[1] = A.v_[3]*x[0] + A.v_[4]*x.mCoords[1] + A.v_[5]*x.mCoords[2];
00753      v.mCoords[2] = A.v_[6]*x[0] + A.v_[7]*x.mCoords[1] + A.v_[8]*x.mCoords[2];
00754   }
00755    
00756   inline void plusEqAx(Vector3D& v, const Matrix3D& A, const Vector3D& x)
00757   {
00758      v.mCoords[0] += A.v_[0]*x[0] + A.v_[1]*x.mCoords[1] + A.v_[2]*x.mCoords[2];
00759      v.mCoords[1] += A.v_[3]*x[0] + A.v_[4]*x.mCoords[1] + A.v_[5]*x.mCoords[2];
00760      v.mCoords[2] += A.v_[6]*x[0] + A.v_[7]*x.mCoords[1] + A.v_[8]*x.mCoords[2];
00761   }
00762   
00763   inline void eqTransAx(Vector3D& v, const Matrix3D& A, const Vector3D& x)
00764   {
00765      v.mCoords[0] = A.v_[0]*x.mCoords[0] + A.v_[3]*x.mCoords[1] + A.v_[6]*x.mCoords[2];
00766      v.mCoords[1] = A.v_[1]*x.mCoords[0] + A.v_[4]*x.mCoords[1] + A.v_[7]*x.mCoords[2];
00767      v.mCoords[2] = A.v_[2]*x.mCoords[0] + A.v_[5]*x.mCoords[1] + A.v_[8]*x.mCoords[2];
00768   } 
00769    
00770   inline void plusEqTransAx(Vector3D& v, const Matrix3D& A, const Vector3D& x)
00771   {
00772      v.mCoords[0] += A.v_[0]*x.mCoords[0] + A.v_[3]*x.mCoords[1] + A.v_[6]*x.mCoords[2];
00773      v.mCoords[1] += A.v_[1]*x.mCoords[0] + A.v_[4]*x.mCoords[1] + A.v_[7]*x.mCoords[2];
00774      v.mCoords[2] += A.v_[2]*x.mCoords[0] + A.v_[5]*x.mCoords[1] + A.v_[8]*x.mCoords[2];
00775   }
00776    
00777   inline void plusEqaA(Matrix3D& B, const double a, const Matrix3D &A) {
00778     B.v_[0] += a*A.v_[0]; B.v_[1] += a*A.v_[1]; B.v_[2] += a*A.v_[2]; 
00779     B.v_[3] += a*A.v_[3]; B.v_[4] += a*A.v_[4]; B.v_[5] += a*A.v_[5];
00780     B.v_[6] += a*A.v_[6]; B.v_[7] += a*A.v_[7]; B.v_[8] += a*A.v_[8];
00781   }
00782 
00783   inline double det(const Matrix3D &A) {
00784     return (  A.v_[0]*(A.v_[4]*A.v_[8]-A.v_[7]*A.v_[5])
00785             -A.v_[1]*(A.v_[3]*A.v_[8]-A.v_[6]*A.v_[5])
00786             +A.v_[2]*(A.v_[3]*A.v_[7]-A.v_[6]*A.v_[4]) );
00787   }
00788 
00789   inline void inv(Matrix3D &Ainv, const Matrix3D &A) {
00790     double inv_detA = 1.0 / (det(A));
00791       //First row of Ainv
00792     Ainv.v_[0] = inv_detA*( A.v_[4]*A.v_[8]-A.v_[5]*A.v_[7] );
00793     Ainv.v_[1] = inv_detA*( A.v_[2]*A.v_[7]-A.v_[8]*A.v_[1] );
00794     Ainv.v_[2] = inv_detA*( A.v_[1]*A.v_[5]-A.v_[4]*A.v_[2] );
00795       //Second row of Ainv
00796     Ainv.v_[3] = inv_detA*( A.v_[5]*A.v_[6]-A.v_[8]*A.v_[3] );
00797     Ainv.v_[4] = inv_detA*( A.v_[0]*A.v_[8]-A.v_[6]*A.v_[2] );
00798     Ainv.v_[5] = inv_detA*( A.v_[2]*A.v_[3]-A.v_[5]*A.v_[0] );
00799       //Third row of Ainv
00800     Ainv.v_[6] = inv_detA*( A.v_[3]*A.v_[7]-A.v_[6]*A.v_[4] );
00801     Ainv.v_[7] = inv_detA*( A.v_[1]*A.v_[6]-A.v_[7]*A.v_[0] );
00802     Ainv.v_[8] = inv_detA*( A.v_[0]*A.v_[4]-A.v_[3]*A.v_[1] );
00803   }
00804 
00805   inline void timesInvA(Matrix3D& B, const Matrix3D &A) {
00806 
00807     Matrix3D Ainv;
00808     inv( Ainv, A );
00809     B = B*Ainv;
00810   }
00811 
00812   inline void QR(Matrix3D &Q, Matrix3D &R, const Matrix3D &A) {
00813     // Compute the QR factorization of A.  This code uses the
00814     // Modified Gram-Schmidt method for computing the factorization.
00815     // The Householder version is more stable, but costs twice as many
00816     // floating point operations.
00817 
00818     Q = A;
00819 
00820     R[0][0] = sqrt(Q[0][0]*Q[0][0] + Q[1][0]*Q[1][0] + Q[2][0]*Q[2][0]);
00821     double temp_dbl = 1.0/R[0][0];
00822     R[1][0] = 0.0L;
00823     R[2][0] = 0.0L;
00824       //Q[0][0] /= R[0][0];
00825       //Q[1][0] /= R[0][0];
00826       //Q[2][0] /= R[0][0];
00827     Q[0][0] *= temp_dbl;
00828     Q[1][0] *= temp_dbl;
00829     Q[2][0] *= temp_dbl;
00830     
00831 
00832     R[0][1]  = Q[0][0]*Q[0][1] + Q[1][0]*Q[1][1] + Q[2][0]*Q[2][1];
00833     Q[0][1] -= Q[0][0]*R[0][1];
00834     Q[1][1] -= Q[1][0]*R[0][1];
00835     Q[2][1] -= Q[2][0]*R[0][1];
00836 
00837     R[0][2]  = Q[0][0]*Q[0][2] + Q[1][0]*Q[1][2] + Q[2][0]*Q[2][2];
00838     Q[0][2] -= Q[0][0]*R[0][2];
00839     Q[1][2] -= Q[1][0]*R[0][2];
00840     Q[2][2] -= Q[2][0]*R[0][2];
00841 
00842     R[1][1] = sqrt(Q[0][1]*Q[0][1] + Q[1][1]*Q[1][1] + Q[2][1]*Q[2][1]);
00843     temp_dbl = 1.0 / R[1][1];
00844     R[2][1] = 0.0L;
00845 //     Q[0][1] /= R[1][1];
00846 //     Q[1][1] /= R[1][1];
00847 //     Q[2][1] /= R[1][1];
00848     Q[0][1] *= temp_dbl;
00849     Q[1][1] *= temp_dbl;
00850     Q[2][1] *= temp_dbl;
00851 
00852     
00853     R[1][2]  = Q[0][1]*Q[0][2] + Q[1][1]*Q[1][2] + Q[2][1]*Q[2][2];
00854     Q[0][2] -= Q[0][1]*R[1][2];
00855     Q[1][2] -= Q[1][1]*R[1][2];
00856     Q[2][2] -= Q[2][1]*R[1][2];
00857   
00858     R[2][2] = sqrt(Q[0][2]*Q[0][2] + Q[1][2]*Q[1][2] + Q[2][2]*Q[2][2]);
00859     temp_dbl = 1.0 / R[2][2];
00860     
00861 //     Q[0][2] /= R[2][2];
00862 //     Q[1][2] /= R[2][2];
00863 //     Q[2][2] /= R[2][2];
00864     Q[0][2] *= temp_dbl;
00865     Q[1][2] *= temp_dbl;
00866     Q[2][2] *= temp_dbl;
00867     
00868     return;
00869   }
00870   
00871 inline bool Matrix3D::positive_definite() const
00872 {
00873   // A = B + C
00874  //where
00875  // B = (A + transpose(A))/2
00876  // C = (A - transpose(A))/2
00877  // B is always a symmetric matrix and 
00878  // A is positive definite iff B is positive definite.
00879  Matrix3D B(*this);
00880  B.plus_transpose_equal( *this );
00881  B *= 0.5;
00882  
00883  // Sylvester's Criterion for positive definite symmetric matrix
00884  return (B[0][0] > 0.0) && (B.sub_det(2,2) > 0.0) && (det(B) > 0.0);
00885 }
